## RedemptionDetails.actualXBRLAmount property

Amount of XBRL that was actually redeemed by the transaction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
actualXBRLAmount: Decimal;
```

## Remarks

This can end up being lower than `attemptedXBRLAmount` due to interference from another transaction that modifies the list of Troves.
